annotations.description: An optional dictionary to add annotations to inputs. These annotations will be used by the client side libraries.
annotations.title: Annotations

id.description: The ID of the individual job.
id.title: Id

message.description: Any message produced by the job. Usually error/debugging hints.
message.title: Message

started_at.description: The time at which the job was started
started_at.title: Started At

finished_at.description: The time at which the task was completed
finished_at.title: Finished At

source.description: Source url for the status object. It can be a recipe or a function.
source.title: Source

runs_pending.description: The count of runs that are pending
runs_pending.title: Runs Pending

runs_running.description: The count of runs that are running
runs_running.title: Runs Running

runs_completed.description: The count of runs that have completed
runs_completed.title: Runs Completed

runs_failed.description: The count of runs that have failed
runs_failed.title: Runs Failed

runs_cancelled.description: The count of runs that have been cancelled
runs_cancelled.title: Runs Cancelled
